name: Degen
description: Degen is a dual-chain meme token launchpad and trading ecosystem designed for both the Solana and X1 blockchains. It allows users to easily create, launch, and trade community-driven meme coins with built-in tools for staking, gamification, and NFT-based incentives. Degen combines on-chain utility with Telegram-native features to drive engagement and viral growth. The platformâ€™s native token, DGN, powers staking tiers, community rewards, and participation in competitive events such as Skull Wars. With a focus on simplicity, speed, and community participation, Degen aims to be the go-to platform for meme token experimentation and culture-driven token economies.
